Featured-image: 8792-mint-strapless-trumpet-evening-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: A simple but elegant satin gown perfect for bridesmaids or dances. The sweetheart neck accents the strapless style and the dress falls to floor with a small trumpet flare. The open back shows off the shoulders and upper back.
